title: New: Azealia Banks – JUMANJI
body:
When she isn’t searching her name on Twitter and blocking anyone who speaks out of turn or cancelling full UK tours, **Azealia Banks** also makes music… yeah weird, right? With **Hudson Mohawke** on production duties _JUMANJI_ was always going to be ridiculously tight, however that’s not to say it’s necessarily any good.

I mean, compare her to the past greats of her genre, the likes of **Lauryn Hill**, **Lil’ Kim** and **MC Lyte** and well, it’s almost offensive to even consider **Banks** in the same sport, nevermind league. I guess she’s got good PR.
